thread.title: Derek
thread.title_full: Prudent Financial Services reviewed by Derek

author: Derek
title: Derek
text:
Prudent offered me solutions tailored to my specific needs and acted in an open, professional and friendly manner. Deborah is fantastic to work with; she is knowledgeable and always there to assist with any questions I may have. I would definitely recommend Prudent!
Derek
